messages.message: XINS/Java Server Framework cannot be bootstrapped. State is unexpected.
XINS/Java Server Framework cannot be bootstrapped. Application server is behaving unexpectedly. Reason: .
Application server implements unexpected version of Java Servlet API Specification. Expected version: . Actual version: .

XINS/Java Server Framework cannot be bootstrapped. System administration issue detected. The system property (defines the location of the runtime configuration file) cannot be read due to a security restriction.
XINS/Java Server Framework cannot be bootstrapped. System administration issue detected. The system property (defines the location of the runtime configuration file) is not set.
XINS/Java Server Framework cannot be bootstrapped. Invalid application package. The build property (defines the name of the API class) is not set.

XINS/Java Server Framework cannot be bootstrapped. Invalid application package. The build property (defines the name of the API class) is set to "", but that class cannot be loaded. Cause is an exception of type , message is .
XINS/Java Server Framework cannot be bootstrapped. Invalid application package. The build property (defines the name of the API class) is set to "", but that class does not derive from class .
XINS/Java Server Framework cannot be bootstrapped. Invalid application package. The build property is required for the API, but not set.
XINS/Java Server Framework cannot be bootstrapped. Invalid application package. The build property is set to , which is considered an invalid value.
XINS/Java Server Framework has been initialized.
